title: How do others feel when you fart in public? - Quora

response.answer_text: From a totally unscientific observation, there are 2 types of farts: 1) The noiseless smelly fart aka The silent killer2) The noisy, less smelly nuclear bomb like explosion you seem to be attempting.  For obvious reasons, there is limited space in my lungs and I don't wish to fill any of it with any one's ass produce, so I'd like to be close to neither.  But if I were a few rows away, a noisy fart would actually compete quite well as the best performance of the day. It will definitely be apart of every answer to the question "How was the show?" The noiseless smelly one is the one everybody hates. Its the sort of mystery that everyone wants to solve, completely forgetting about the show. Please let me know the place and time if you are planning to tear it up.
